Welcome to my resume!

I have a multidisclipinary background. After a year studying Biology, I decided to pursue History and International Relations. After my studies I worked in international business, taking on various roles within small companies. During and after this I discovered a love for programming. I started of doing front-end (js/Angular), then continued with NodeJS, Java(spring), database. To become better at Java I build various Android apps. I was selected for a Java traineeship in which I gained an OCA-certification, currently I work as a Java software engineer for Keylane.
